name: Glattony-ghost
tagline: A simple way to start with ghost, this amazing cms, with a simple template. With bootstrap 3 integrates, many features and a little pieces of "override", every page can be amazing. It's good for every ghost-lover.
body:
![All rights are reserved](http://media-cache-ec0.pinimg.com/originals/43/8a/ec/438aecfabdf765b39e663632781329ae.jpg)
## How to do?
It's the same for every ghost's template

### 1 Download
Ok, it's not so easy :)

### 2 Unzipped
Unzip inside a unique folder, and call it **glattony**

### 3 Install
Go to your ghost's folder installation and put entire folder inside 

    root/content/themes/

### 4 Restart
Restart your ghost's installation

###5 Select and Enjoy
Go to

    www.youdomain.com/ghost-folder-installation/ghost

and log in it. Select menu voice **settings** and find **theme** field. Select glattony and save!
Enjoy!!!
